title: Mint Supervisor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Synergy!- (Night) [Cheat] If you use this, Cogs may visit each other instead of using another action during the night. A Cog that is visited by another Cog will become roleblock, redirect, and control immune for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Life Insurance (Passive) Your Defense tier is equal to the number of other Cogs alive. So if 3 Cogs are alive, you have Powerful Defense.
-Synergy! may be multitasked with you visiting another Cog.

desc:
Post 4026
*While I still have assets, I am insured.*
